text: wallah taealaa khalaq kula ma ydib ealaa al'ard min ma', falma' 'asl khlqh, faman hadhih aldwab: man yamshi zhfana ealaa batnih kalhyaat wnhwha, waminhum man yamshi ealaa rajulayn kal'insan, waminhum man yamshi ealaa arbe kalbhaym wnhwha. wallah subhanah wteala yakhluq ma ysha', wahu qadir ealaa kl shy'
